references.reason: This paper is foundational to the current study as it describes GPT-4, a large language model used in the Any2AnyTryon framework for generating user instructions.

references.paper_title: Viton-hd: High-resolution virtual try-on via misalignment-aware normalization
references.reason: This paper introduces the VITON-HD dataset, which is one of the key datasets used in the study for training and evaluation, significantly influencing the quality and scope of the Any2AnyTryon model.

references.paper_title: CatVTON: Concatenation Is All You Need for Virtual Try-On with Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper proposes the CatVTON model, a significant approach in virtual try-on that is directly compared against and improved upon by the Any2AnyTryon framework.

references.paper_title: Viton: An image-based virtual try-on network
references.reason: This is an early and influential paper in the field of virtual try-on which lays the groundwork for many subsequent works, including the current research.

references.paper_title: StableGarment: Garment-Centric Generation via Stable Diffusion
references.reason: This paper presents the StableGarment method, which is directly compared with Any2AnyTryon, showcasing the advancements in virtual try-on that the current research builds upon.
